name: The legend of Janitor DEMO1
description:
Thank you for your attention. First of all, excuse my awful English!
This game is my first project, and I put it here precisely so that the project can be better evaluated.

Basically it's a top-down metroidvania game.

Instructions:
Arrows -> Move the character
Z -> Attack/Interact
X -> Jump
C -> Use item
A -> Dash (When you have the dash relic)
1 -> Use Skill 1
2 -> Use Skill 2
3 -> Use Skill 3
4 -> Use Skill 4
5 -> Use Skill 5
P or Esc -> Pause The Game.

Some Observations:
You can change the game commands in Settings>Controls>Keyboard.
The joystick does not work natively (I intend to change this in future versions).
In the game there are two languages available (English and Portuguese), to switch between the two, go to Settings>Language.
Feel free to make any kind of criticism.
Some bugs are expected, so be patient ^^'.
